decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, KHAN/PLAN/01, KHAN/PLAN/02 and KHAN/PLAN/04, received on 13/11/2013 and KHAN/PLAN/03, received on 06/01/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The restaurant (A3) use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times: 11.30am -11pm, Monday to Saturday and 11.30am - 11pm on Sundays and Bank Holidays.
Condition : 4 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted for restaurant and mini-cab office purposes shall not be begun until full particulars and details of a scheme to insulate the premises against the transmission of airborne and impact sound to the residential accommodation above has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given.

Condition : 6 - The mini-cab office hereby approved shall take only telephone bookings after 12pm on any day and shall not be open to the public beyond this time. The office shall appear clearly shut to passing trade beyond this time.
Condition : 7 - The appearance of the front bay feature shall match the appearance of the front bay feature seen at 78 Kingsley Road, Hounslow in terms of scale, design and materials.
description: Change of use of existing internet caf? at No 80 to a restaurant amalgamated with existing restaurant at No 82. and a minicab office, together with alterations to the front elevation.
